name: Broken Circuit
description:
Simple logic game. The goal is to power all lamps on game grid. Each cell of the grid contains lamp or wire, central cell contains power source. Initially all elements in cell are turned by random angle, so wires and lamps are not connected to the source. You can rotate each of them to restore the right combination (any initial combination has at least one solvation). You start from something like this:

To end the game you should turn in to this:

The field size can be from 3x3 up to as large as your monitor can show. The field can be wrapped (wires can go through the borders) and unwrapped.

Detailed help is included into the game.

You need .NET 4.5 to run this game.

Supported languages: english, russian (autoselect bases on system settings).
